languages.text: "Да. Эта надпись все время появлялась в нашем доме, и никто не знал, кто ее пишет. Когда я была маленькая, дедушка радовался этому. Видел и сразу улыбался! Но потом... когда я стала чуть больше, а дедушка уже старенький... он не радовался больше. Он грустил. Садился, долго смотрел перед собой. И потом, когда он заболел..." {n}Девочка замолкает, ее большие глаза блестят от слез.{/n}

"He did. That word kept appearing in our house, and nobody knew who wrote it. It used to make Grandpa happy when I was little. He always smiled when he saw it! But then... later, when I was a little bigger and Grandpa was already old... it stopped making him happy. He was sad. He would just sit there and stare at nothing. And after that, when he got sick..." {n}She stops, her big eyes glistening with tears.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да. Эта надпись все время появлялась в нашем доме, и никто не знал, кто ее пишет. Когда я была маленькая, дедушка радовался этому. Видел и сразу улыбался! Но потом... когда я стала чуть больше, а дедушка уже старенький... он не радовался больше. Он грустил. Садился, долго смотрел перед собой. И потом, когда он заболел..." {n}Девочка замолкает, ее большие глаза блестят от слез.{/n}

But then... later, when I was a little bigger and Grandpa was already old... it stopped making him happy. He was sad. He would just sit there and stare at nothing. And after that, when he became sick..." {n}She stops, her big eyes glistening with tears.{/n}

languages.text: “他提到过。这个词总是出现在我们家里，没人知道是谁写的。在我小的时候，这个词会逗得爷爷很开心。每次他看到这个词时，总是会微笑起来！但后来……我长大之后，爷爷也变老了……这个词就不再让他开心了。他很难过，他只是坐在那里，盯着空气。再后来，他生病的时候……”{n}她顿了顿，一双大眼睛里闪烁着泪光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did. That word kept appearing in our house, and nobody knew who wrote it. It used to make Grandpa happy when I was little. He always smiled when he saw it! But then... later, when I was a little bigger and Grandpa was already old... it stopped making him happy. He was sad. He would just sit there and stare at nothing. And after that, when he got sick..." {n}She stops, her big eyes glistening with tears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他提到过。这个词总是出现在我们家里，没人知道是谁写的。在我小的时候，这个词会逗得爷爷很开心。每次他看到这个词时，总是会微笑起来！但后来……我长大之后，爷爷也变老了……这个词就不再让他开心了。他很难过，他只是坐在那里，盯着空气。再后来，他生病的时候……”{n}她顿了顿，一双大眼睛里闪烁着泪光。{/n}

languages.text: «Sí. Esa palabra aparecía mucho en nuestra casa y nadie sabía quién la escribía. Cuando era pequeña, alegraba mucho al abuelo. ¡Siempre sonreía cuando la veía! Pero... después, cuando era más mayor y el abuelo ya era viejo... dejó de alegrarle. Le ponía triste. Se quedaba sentado mirando a la nada. Y después, cuando se puso malito...». {n}Hace una pausa mientras las lágrimas relucen en sus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did. That word kept appearing in our house, and nobody knew who wrote it. It used to make Grandpa happy when I was little. He always smiled when he saw it! But then... later, when I was a little bigger and Grandpa was already old... it stopped making him happy. He was sad. He would just sit there and stare at nothing. And after that, when he got sick..." {n}She stops, her big eyes glistening with tears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Esa palabra aparecía mucho en nuestra casa y nadie sabía quién la escribía. Cuando era pequeña, alegraba mucho al abuelo. ¡Siempre sonreía cuando la veía! Pero... después, cuando era más mayor y el abuelo ya era viejo... dejó de alegrarle. Le ponía triste. Se quedaba sentado mirando a la nada. Y después, cuando se puso malito...». {n}Hace una pausa mientras las lágrimas relucen en sus ojos.{/n}

languages.text: 「うん。何回も家の中に出てきて、誰が書いたのかもわからないの。私がもっと小さいときは、おじいちゃんはその言葉を見て喜んでたよ！でも…私が大きくなって、おじいちゃんがどんどん年を取ってからは…嬉しそうじゃなくなった。いつも悲しそうにしてた。ずっとそこに座って、ボーッとしてたの。そのうち、病気になっちゃって…」{n}大きな瞳を涙で輝かせながら、彼女は口を閉ざす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did. That word kept appearing in our house, and nobody knew who wrote it. It used to make Grandpa happy when I was little. He always smiled when he saw it! But then... later, when I was a little bigger and Grandpa was already old... it stopped making him happy. He was sad. He would just sit there and stare at nothing. And after that, when he got sick..." {n}She stops, her big eyes glistening with tears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「うん。何回も家の中に出てきて、誰が書いたのかもわからないの。私がもっと小さいときは、おじいちゃんはその言葉を見て喜んでたよ！でも…私が大きくなって、おじいちゃんがどんどん年を取ってからは…嬉しそうじゃなくなった。いつも悲しそうにしてた。ずっとそこに座って、ボーッとしてたの。そのうち、病気になっちゃって…」{n}大きな瞳を涙で輝かせながら、彼女は口を閉ざす。{/n}

languages.text: "Ja. Das Wort erschien immer wieder in unserem Haus, und niemand wusste, wer es geschrieben hat. Opa hat es glücklich gemacht, als ich klein war. Er hat immer gelächelt, wenn er es gesehen hat! Aber später ... als ich etwas größer war und Opa schon alt ... hat es ihn nicht mehr glücklich gemacht. Er war traurig. Er saß nur da und starrte ins Nichts. Und danach, als er krank wurde ..." {n}Sie bricht ab, in ihren Augen glitzern Tränen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did. That word kept appearing in our house, and nobody knew who wrote it. It used to make Grandpa happy when I was little. He always smiled when he saw it! But then... later, when I was a little bigger and Grandpa was already old... it stopped making him happy. He was sad. He would just sit there and stare at nothing. And after that, when he got sick..." {n}She stops, her big eyes glistening with tears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Das Wort erschien immer wieder in unserem Haus, und niemand wusste, wer es geschrieben hat. Opa hat es glücklich gemacht, als ich klein war. Er hat immer gelächelt, wenn er es gesehen hat! Aber später ... als ich etwas größer war und Opa schon alt ... hat es ihn nicht mehr glücklich gemacht. Er war traurig. Er saß nur da und starrte ins Nichts. Und danach, als er krank wurde ..." {n}Sie bricht ab, in ihren Augen glitzern Tränen.{/n}

languages.text: « Oui. Ce mot n'arrêtait pas d'apparaître dans la maison et personne ne savait qui l'écrivait. Quand j'étais petite, ça rendait papi heureux. Il souriait chaque fois qu'il le voyait ! Mais... après, quand j'étais un peu plus grande et que papi était vraiment vieux... ça ne le rendait plus heureux. Ça le rendait triste. Il s'asseyait et regardait dans le vide. Et puis après, quand il est tombé malade... » {n}Elle s'interrompt et ses grands yeux se remplissent de larmes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did. That word kept appearing in our house, and nobody knew who wrote it. It used to make Grandpa happy when I was little. He always smiled when he saw it! But then... later, when I was a little bigger and Grandpa was already old... it stopped making him happy. He was sad. He would just sit there and stare at nothing. And after that, when he got sick..." {n}She stops, her big eyes glistening with tears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Ce mot n'arrêtait pas d'apparaître dans la maison et personne ne savait qui l'écrivait. Quand j'étais petite, ça rendait papi heureux. Il souriait chaque fois qu'il le voyait ! Mais... après, quand j'étais un peu plus grande et que papi était vraiment vieux... ça ne le rendait plus heureux. Ça le rendait triste. Il s'asseyait et regardait dans le vide. Et puis après, quand il est tombé malade... » {n}Elle s'interrompt et ses grands yeux se remplissent de larmes.{/n}

languages.text: "Bahsetti. O kelime sürekli evimizde beliriyordu ama kimin yazdığını bilen yoktu. Ben küçükken dedemi mutlu ederdi. O kelimeyi her gördüğünde gülümserdi! Ama sonra... Ben az daha büyüyüp dedem de iyice yaşlanınca artık mutlu olmamaya başladı. Üzgündü. Oturup öylece boşluğa bakardı. Sonra hastalandı zaten." {n}Koca gözleri yaşlarla parlayan kız duraksıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did. That word kept appearing in our house, and nobody knew who wrote it. It used to make Grandpa happy when I was little. He always smiled when he saw it! But then... later, when I was a little bigger and Grandpa was already old... it stopped making him happy. He was sad. He would just sit there and stare at nothing. And after that, when he got sick..." {n}She stops, her big eyes glistening with tears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bahsetti. O kelime sürekli evimizde beliriyordu ama kimse kimin yazdığını bilmiyordu. Ben küçükken dedemi mutlu ederdi. O kelimeyi her gördüğünde gülümserdi. Ama sonra... Ben biraz büyüdüğümde ve dedem hâlâ yaşlıyken artık mutlu olmamaya başladı. Üzgündü. Oturup öylece boşluğa bakardı. Sonra hastalandı zaten..."{n}Koca gözleri yaşlarla dolan kız duraksıyor.{/n}
